SEARCH
Package Entities

Class EntityManager

java.lang.Object
Entities.EntityManager
public class EntityManager extends Object
The EntityManager class manages entities within the game. It provides methods for creating, finding, and drawing entities.

      Spawns obstacles in the game grid.
      Parameters:

      clearRadius - The radius around the center where no obstacles will be spawned.
